questions.question: What is the AI Factory?
answers: A zone for training and governing an AI model.
A decentralized framework for creating a specialized zone in the training and governance of an AI model.
A zone for making one's model available for inferences.
A decentralized framework for creating a specialized zone in a marketplace of pre-trained models.

questions.question: What is the primary mission of OKP4 in relation to the AI Factory? ?
answers: To individually reconstruct each infrastructure component for AI Factory development.
To create a centralized marketplace for AI-related services.
To provide a decentralized orchestration layer for Training-as-a-service.
To develop cutting-edge technologies for AI model training.

questions.question: How does OKP4 contribute to Resilient Service-Level Agreements?
answers: By simplifying data provenance and sacrificing privacy considerations.
By allowing flexibility in consent rules to accommodate various privacy preferences.
By prioritizing computation speed over integrity to meet SLA requirements.
By ensuring the transparency of the workflow and resisting censorship.

questions.question: Which of these statements is false?
answers: The creation of a Zone via the AI Factory requires the creation of a DAO.
The AI Factory allows the creation of a zone with an autocratic governance.
The AI Factory allows the creation of a zone with a democratic governance.
The creation of a Zone via the AI Factory necessarily needs a governance mechanism.

questions.question: Why does OKP4 aim to create a Privacy-Preserving Data Labeling Service?
answers: To decentralize data labeling services within the Dataverse.
To enable contributors to perform computations on encrypted data.
To enhance privacy during collaborative model development.
OKP4 does not intend to create specific zones but provides infrastructure and framework for such services to be implemented.

questions.question: I didn't fully understand Beyond the AI Factory part, is it a big deal?
answers: Yes, it is. OKP4 must be at the forefront of AI technology to offer suitable zones and services for its development.
Not really. As a decentralized orchestrator layer, OKP4 only needs to ensure communication between these zones and should not focus on research in these domains.
Yes, it is. Even though OKP4 doesn't have to develop all these projects, it is important to understand them well to offer the most suitable governance and business templates.

Not really. OKP4 must ensure to offer a decentralized, auditable, and modular infrastructure for communication, coordination between digital resources within Zones, while ensuring that the rules and conditions of each are respected.
